articles.title: Trailblazing Star Trek actress Nichelle Nichols dies at 89 - BBC
articles.description: She became one of the first black American actresses to play a figure in authority on US television.
articles.content:
American actress Nichelle Nichols, best known for her role in 1960s sci-fi TV series Star Trek, has died aged 89.
Ms Nichols broke barriers in her role as Lieutenant Nyota Uhura in the series, becom… [+2508 chars]
